title: 我弄好了皮肤但别人看不见，求高手解决
txt_content:
我弄好了自己能看见别人看不见，朋友叫我去上传，我在那个上传的地方注册，进入Profile之后，不知在在哪里上传，求高手解答看看下面到底是哪个？


ProfilePlayer name:
940639249


E-mail:
9********@q*.com
( The address has been obfuscated, hence the *** )

Click here to change your password 
Change Your SkinYou need to buy the game to be able to change your skin.


Gift codesGift codes can be used to give the game away to other people.
To give the game to another player, give them one of the unused codes and ask them to visit http://www.minecraft.net/redeem.jsp

Buy more codes.

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 well 于 2011-8-16 16:34 编辑 

正版用戶才能透過遊戲官網上傳皮膚... 

非正版用戶請參考這裡...
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-6939-1-1.html

這帖也可以參考一下...
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-8229-1-1.html

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 必须正版才能上传皮肤唉。。。。 不然谁都玩盗版去了
